item.description:
Refreshments: cheese/fruit/crackers and vegetable crudite with herb dip will be served-drinks and sandwiches can be purchased at Coolidge Park Bar and Caf√©

Suggested donation at the door: Complimentary - bring your good cheer and money for drinks

Parking: ample free parking behind the Hotel Northampton

Join fellow Hidden-Techies and Hidden-Tech board members for our tenth annual Holiday Social. This event is always a classic - come see some old friends and make a few new ones. No need to bring anything except your good holiday cheer. It's a busy time of year, so we scheduled the social so you can swing by anytime during the evening and say hello. This will also be a great chance to share with the board any ideas you have for Hidden Tech programming in the spring and swap stories on what worked and what didn't for Hidden Tech businesses in 2012.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Hidden-Tech Presents: Our Annual Holiday Social
